english.segment1: Burned out. I'd wish you know. For days, I've thought of you so. Burned out in style. I wish you wouldn't go. Behind the old house. And wait and wait and wait
english.segment2: Hope for now. This is the last stop. Just take me for a ride. Come now. Come for the last drop. Just take me for a ride
english.segment4: Burned out. I'd wish you know. For days, I've thought of you so. Burned out in style. I wish you wouldn't go. Behind the old house. And wait and wait and wait
english.segment5: Hope for now. This is the last drop. Just take me for a ride. Come now. Come for the last stop. Just take me for a ride
